item-circuit-board-high-speed.name: A.I. Limiter
item-circuit-board-high-speed.description: A.I. Limiter are super advanced electronics that are used to control A.I.s and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

item-resource-sink-shop.name: AWESOME Shop
item-resource-sink-shop.description:
Redeem your FICSIT Coupons here! 
For those employees going the extra kilometer we have set aside special bonus milestones and rewards! Get your Coupons in the AWESOME Sink program now!

*No refunds possible.

item-resource-sink.name: AWESOME Sink
item-resource-sink.description:
Got excess resources? Fear not, for FICSIT does not waste! The newly developed AWESOME Sink turns any useful part straight into research data, as fast as you can supply it! 
Participating pioneers will be compensated with Coupons to be spend at the AWESOME Shop.

item-space-elevator-part-5.name: Adaptive Control Unit
item-space-elevator-part-5.description: Project Part #5. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

item-aluminum-plate.name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
item-aluminum-plate.description: Thin lightweight & highly durable sheet that is mainly used for products that need to be light or have high heat conduction.

item-hog-parts.name: Alien Carapace
item-hog-parts.description: Thick and sturdy natural armor plates from alien creatures.

item-alumina-solution.name: Alumina Solution
item-alumina-solution.description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into pure Aluminum.

item-aluminum-ingot.name: Aluminum Ingot
item-aluminum-ingot.description: Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap. It is mostly used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

item-aluminum-scrap.name: Aluminum Scrap
item-aluminum-scrap.description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

item-assembler-mk1.name: Assembler
item-assembler-mk1.description:
Crafts two parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

item-space-elevator-part-3.name: Automated Wiring
item-space-elevator-part-3.description: Project Part #3. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

item-shroom.name: Bacon Agaric
item-shroom.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore two health segments.

item-battery.name: Battery
item-battery.description: Batteries store an electrical charge. They are primarily used as a power source.

item-ore-bauxite.name: Bauxite
item-ore-bauxite.description: Bauxite is turned into Aluminum Ingots via an advanced smelting process.

item-equipment-descriptor-beacon.name: Beacon
item-equipment-descriptor-beacon.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Used to mark areas of interest. Displayed on your compass with the color and name you set for it.

item-nut.name: Beryl Nut
item-nut.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore half a health segment.

item-generic-biomass.name: Biomass
item-generic-biomass.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy efficient than raw biological matter.

item-generator-biomass.name: Biomass Burner
item-generator-biomass.description:
Burns various forms of biomass to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has no input and must therefore be fed biomass manually.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

item-gunpowder.name: Black powder
item-gunpowder.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used in explosives and cartridges.

item-equipment-descriptor-jumping-stilts.name: Blade Runners
item-equipment-descriptor-jumping-stilts.description:
Slot: Body

A exoskeleton for your lower legs that assist your movement, allowing you to sprint faster and jump higher.
Also dampens the impact of landing.

item-cable.name: Cable
item-cable.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

item-gold-ingot.name: Caterium Ingot
item-gold-ingot.description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

item-ore-gold.name: Caterium Ore
item-ore-gold.description: Caterium Ore is smelted into Caterium Ingots. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

item-wall-door-8x4-01.name: Center Door Wall
item-wall-door-8x4-01.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
The door allows Pioneers to pass through the wall.

item-wall-door-8x4-01-steel.name: Center Door Wall
item-wall-door-8x4-01-steel.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
The door allows Pioneers to pass through the wall.

item-chainsaw.name: Chainsaw
item-chainsaw.description:
Slot: Hands
Fuel: Biofuel

Used to clear an area of flora that is too difficult to remove by hand.

item-circuit-board.name: Circuit Board
item-circuit-board.description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

item-coal.name: Coal
item-coal.description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

item-generator-coal.name: Coal Generator
item-generator-coal.description:
Burns Coal to boil Water, the produced steam rotates turbines to generate electricty for the power grid.
Has a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input, so both the Coal and Water supply can be automated.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

item-color-cartridge.name: Color Cartridge
item-color-cartridge.description:
Ammo for the Color Gun.
Necessary to change the color of factory buildings and vehicles.

item-equipment-descriptor-color-gun.name: Color Gun
item-equipment-descriptor-color-gun.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Color Cartridge

Paints factory buildings and vehicles. The color can be adjusted prior to painting.

item-compacted-coal.name: Compacted Coal
item-compacted-coal.description: A much more efficient alternative for Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators.

item-computer.name: Computer
item-computer.description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.

item-cement.name: Concrete
item-cement.description:
Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.

item-constructor-mk1.name: Constructor
item-constructor-mk1.description:
Crafts one part into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

item-conveyor-belt-mk1.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.1
item-conveyor-belt-mk1.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

item-conveyor-belt-mk2.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.2
item-conveyor-belt-mk2.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

item-conveyor-belt-mk3.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.3
item-conveyor-belt-mk3.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

item-conveyor-belt-mk4.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.4
item-conveyor-belt-mk4.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

item-conveyor-belt-mk5.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.5
item-conveyor-belt-mk5.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

item-conveyor-lift-mk1.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.1
item-conveyor-lift-mk1.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

item-conveyor-lift-mk2.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.2
item-conveyor-lift-mk2.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

item-conveyor-lift-mk3.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.3
item-conveyor-lift-mk3.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

item-conveyor-lift-mk4.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.4
item-conveyor-lift-mk4.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

item-conveyor-lift-mk5.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.5
item-conveyor-lift-mk5.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

item-conveyor-attachment-merger.name: Conveyor Merger
item-conveyor-attachment-merger.description: Merges up to three conveyor belts into one.

item-conveyor-pole.name: Conveyor Pole
item-conveyor-pole.description:
Can be used as a connection for conveyor belts. The height of the pole can be adjusted.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

item-conveyor-attachment-splitter.name: Conveyor Splitter
item-conveyor-attachment-splitter.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
Useful to move parts and resources from oversaturated conveyor belts.

item-conveyor-pole-wall.name: Conveyor Wall Mount
item-conveyor-pole-wall.description:
Can be attached to walls and is used as a connection for conveyor belts.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

item-copper-ingot.name: Copper Ingot
item-copper-ingot.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

item-ore-copper.name: Copper Ore
item-ore-copper.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for electricity.

item-copper-sheet.name: Copper Sheet
item-copper-sheet.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

item-work-bench.name: Craft Bench
item-work-bench.description:
Allows you to manually craft a large range of different parts. 
These parts can then be used in construction of different factory buildings, vehicles and equipment.

item-liquid-oil.name: Crude Oil
item-liquid-oil.description: Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

item-crystal-oscillator.name: Crystal Oscillator
item-crystal-oscillator.description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

item-cyber-wagon.name: Cyber Wagon
item-cyber-wagon.description:
Absolutely indestructible.
Needs no further introduction.

item-ramp-double-8x1.name: Double Ramp 8m x 2m
item-ramp-double-8x1.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

item-ramp-double.name: Double Ramp 8m x 4m
item-ramp-double.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

item-ramp-8x8x8.name: Double Ramp 8m x 8m
item-ramp-8x8x8.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

item-power-pole-wall-double.name: Double Wall Outlet Mk.1
item-power-pole-wall-double.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

item-power-pole-wall-double-mk2.name: Double Wall Outlet Mk.2
item-power-pole-wall-double-mk2.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

item-power-pole-wall-double-mk3.name: Double Wall Outlet Mk.3
item-power-pole-wall-double-mk3.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

item-ramp-inverted-8x1-corner-02.name: Down Corner 8m x 1m Inverted
item-ramp-inverted-8x1-corner-02.description:
Inverted Ramps mostly provide aesthetic options.
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-ramp-inverted-8x2-corner-02.name: Down Corner 8m x 2m Inverted
item-ramp-inverted-8x2-corner-02.description:
Inverted Ramps mostly provide aesthetic options.
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-ramp-inverted-8x4-corner-02.name: Down Corner 8m x 4m Inverted
item-ramp-inverted-8x4-corner-02.description:
Inverted Ramps mostly provide aesthetic options.
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-ramp-diagonal-8x1-01.name: Down Corner Ramp 8m x 1m
item-ramp-diagonal-8x1-01.description:
Ramps make it easier to get up onto Foundations for Pioneers and their Vehicles.
Height: 1

item-ramp-diagonal-8x2-01.name: Down Corner Ramp 8m x 2m
item-ramp-diagonal-8x2-01.description:
Ramps make it easier to get up onto Foundations for Pioneers and their Vehicles.
Height: 2

item-ramp-diagonal-8x4-01.name: Down Corner Ramp 8m x 4m
item-ramp-diagonal-8x4-01.description:
Ramps make it easier to get up onto Foundations for Pioneers and their Vehicles.
Height: 4

item-locomotive.name: Electric Locomotive
item-locomotive.description:
The Locomotive is used to move Freight Cars from station to station.
Requires between 25-110 MW of power to drive. 
Must be built on railway.

Nicknamed 'Leif' by FICSIT pioneers because of its reliability.

item-electromagnetic-control-rod.name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
item-electromagnetic-control-rod.description: Control Rods regulate power expenditure via electromagnetism.

item-fluid-canister.name: Empty Canister
item-fluid-canister.description: Used to package fluids for transportation. Can be recycled.

item-train-platform-empty.name: Empty Platform
item-train-platform-empty.description: An empty train platform for when you need to create some empty space.

item-steel-plate-reinforced.name: Encased Industrial Beam
item-steel-plate-reinforced.description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

item-uranium-cell.name: Encased Uranium Cell
item-uranium-cell.description:
Uranium Cells are concrete encased uranium pellets. Primarily used to make Nuclear Fuel Rods
Moderately radioactive.

item-explorer.name: Explorer
item-explorer.description:
Fuel: Any fuel type

25 slot inventory. Has a built in craft bench.
Fast and nimble exploration vehicle. Tuned for really rough terrain and can climb almost vertical surfaces.

item-fabric.name: Fabric
item-fabric.description:
Used for equipment crafting.
Flexible but durable fabric.

item-golf-cart.name: Factory Cart™
item-golf-cart.description:
The one and only FICSIT Factory Cart™
Now with special - FICSIT Foundation only - Grip Wheels, for an even smoother and faster factory floor experience!

item-fence-01.name: Fence
item-fence-01.description: The Fence can be built on the edges of floors to prevent you from falling off.

item-flower-petals.name: Flower Petals
item-flower-petals.description:
Used for crafting.
Colorful native flower petals.

item-pipe-storage-tank.name: Fluid Buffer
item-pipe-storage-tank.description:
Can contain up to 400m³ of fluid.
Has an in and output for pipes.

item-train-docking-station-liquid.name: Fluid Freight Platform
item-train-docking-station-liquid.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms, Stations, and Rails.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

item-foundation-8x1-01.name: Foundation 8m x 1m
item-foundation-8x1-01.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

item-foundation-8x2-01.name: Foundation 8m x 2m
item-foundation-8x2-01.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

item-foundation-8x4-01.name: Foundation 8m x 4m
item-foundation-8x4-01.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

item-foundry-mk1.name: Foundry
item-foundry-mk1.description:
Smelts two resources into alloy ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the inputs. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

item-foundation-frame-01.name: Frame Foundation 8m x 4m
item-foundation-frame-01.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

item-wall-window-8x4-02.name: Frame Window
item-wall-window-8x4-02.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
The windows allow Pioneers to see through the wall.

item-freight-wagon.name: Freight Car
item-freight-wagon.description:
The Freight Car can be built on Railways and attached to an Electric Locomotive or other Freight Car to transport resources. 
Resources are loaded and unloaded at Freight Platforms.
Has a 1600m³ or 32 slot capacity, depending on the resources.

item-train-docking-station.name: Freight Platform
item-train-docking-station.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms, Stations, and Rails.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

item-liquid-fuel.name: Fuel
item-liquid-fuel.description: Fuel is either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

item-generator-fuel.name: Fuel Generator
item-generator-fuel.description:
Consumes Fuel to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Pipe input so the Fuel supply can be automated.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

item-filter.name: Gas Filter
item-filter.description: Used in gas masks to filter out pollutants in the air.

item-equipment-descriptor-gasmask.name: Gas mask
item-equipment-descriptor-gasmask.description:
Slot: Body

Allows you to breathe normally in poison gas. Consumes Gas Filters from your inventory when you are in poison gas.

item-wall-gate-8x4-01.name: Gate Wall
item-wall-gate-8x4-01.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
The gate allows Pioneers to pass through the wall.

item-generator-geo-thermal.name: Geothermal Generator
item-generator-geo-thermal.description:
Can only be built on geyser nodes.
Generates electricity for your power grid.
Does not require any resources to be input.

item-foundation-glass-01.name: Glass Foundation 8m x 1m
item-foundation-glass-01.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

item-crystal.name: Green Power Slug
item-crystal.description: A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

item-hubparts.name: HUB Parts
item-hubparts.description: The parts required to build the basic structure of the HUB.

item-equipment-descriptor-hazmat-suit.name: Hazmat Suit
item-equipment-descriptor-hazmat-suit.description:
Slot: Body

Shields you from the adverse effects of radiation. 
Consumes Iodine Infused Filters from your inventory when you are in radioactive areas.

item-heavy-oil-residue.name: Heavy Oil Residue
item-heavy-oil-residue.description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

item-high-speed-connector.name: High-Speed Connector
item-high-speed-connector.description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

item-pipe-hyper.name: Hyper Tube
item-pipe-hyper.description:
Tubes for transporting FICSIT employees.
A Hyper Tube Entrance needs to be attached to power and enter a Hyper Tube system.

item-pipe-hyper-start.name: Hyper Tube Entrance
item-pipe-hyper-start.description: Used to enter and power a Hyper Tube.

item-pipe-hyper-support.name: Hyper Tube Support
item-pipe-hyper-support.description: Supports for Hyper Tubes to allow for longer distances.

item-hyper-tube-wall-hole.name: Hyper Tube Wall Hole
item-hyper-tube-wall-hole.description: Can be attached to walls to allow Hyper Tubes to pass through them.

item-hyper-tube-wall-support.name: Hyper Tube Wall Support
item-hyper-tube-wall-support.description:
Can be attached to walls. 
Supports for Hyper Tubes to allow for longer distances.

item-industrial-tank.name: Industrial Fluid Buffer
item-industrial-tank.description:
Can contain up to 2400m³ of fluid.
Has an in and output for pipes.

item-storage-container-mk2.name: Industrial Storage Container
item-storage-container-mk2.description:
Contains 48 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has two inputs and outputs for conveyor belts.

item-quarter-pipe-corner-01.name: Inner-Corner Quarter Pipe
item-quarter-pipe-corner-01.description:
Provides an optional factory look that is smoother and offers possibilities for recreational activities. 
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-quarter-pipe-corner-02.name: Inverted Inner-Corner Quarter Pipe
item-quarter-pipe-corner-02.description:
Provides an optional factory look that is smoother and offers possibilities for recreational activities. 
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-quarter-pipe-corner-04.name: Inverted Outer-Corner Quarter Pipe
item-quarter-pipe-corner-04.description:
Provides an optional factory look that is smoother and offers possibilities for recreational activities. 
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-quarter-pipe-02.name: Inverted Quarter Pipe
item-quarter-pipe-02.description:
Provides an optional factory look that is smoother and offers possibilities for recreational activities. 
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-ramp-inverted-8x1.name: Inverted Ramp 8m x 1m
item-ramp-inverted-8x1.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

item-ramp-inverted-8x2-01.name: Inverted Ramp 8m x 2m
item-ramp-inverted-8x2-01.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

item-ramp-8x4-inverted-01.name: Inverted Ramp 8m x 4m
item-ramp-8x4-inverted-01.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

item-hazmat-filter.name: Iodine Infused Filter
item-hazmat-filter.description: Used in hazmat suits to filter out radioactive particles in the air.

item-iron-ingot.name: Iron Ingot
item-iron-ingot.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

item-ore-iron.name: Iron Ore
item-ore-iron.description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

item-iron-plate.name: Iron Plate
item-iron-plate.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

item-iron-rod.name: Iron Rod
item-iron-rod.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

item-equipment-descriptor-jet-pack.name: Jetpack
item-equipment-descriptor-jet-pack.description:
Slot: Body

Allows you to move more freely in the air. Consumes Fuel when used and refills with Fuel from your inventory when you're on the ground.

item-jump-pad-adjustable.name: Jump Pad
item-jump-pad-adjustable.description:
Used for quick, vertical traversal.
The launch angle can be adjusted while building.
Caution: Be sure to land safely!

item-ladder.name: Ladder
item-ladder.description: A ladder with a default height of 2 meters, which can be extended while building. Snaps to walls and foundations.

item-leaves.name: Leaves
item-leaves.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

item-wall-door-8x4-02.name: Left Door Wall
item-wall-door-8x4-02.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
The door allows Pioneers to pass through the wall.

item-wall-door-8x4-02-steel.name: Left Door Wall
item-wall-door-8x4-02-steel.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
The door allows Pioneers to pass through the wall.

item-stone.name: Limestone
item-stone.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.

item-liquid-biofuel.name: Liquid Biofuel
item-liquid-biofuel.description:
Fuel.
The most energy efficient form of biomass.

item-lookout-tower.name: Lookout Tower
item-lookout-tower.description: Provides a good OVERVIEW useful for building.

item-mam.name: M.A.M.
item-mam.description:
The Molecular Analysis Machine is used to analyse new and exotic materials found on alien planets.
R&D will assist Pioneers through the M.A.M. to turn any valuable data into usable research options and new technologies.

item-manufacturer-mk1.name: Manufacturer
item-manufacturer-mk1.description:
Crafts three or four parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

item-medkit.name: Medicinal Inhaler
item-medkit.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be inhaled to fully restore health.

item-miner-mk2.name: Miner Mk.2
item-miner-mk2.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 120 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

item-miner-mk3.name: Miner Mk.3
item-miner-mk3.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 240 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

item-miner-mk1.name: Miner Mk1
item-miner-mk1.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 60 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

item-space-elevator-part-4.name: Modular Engine
item-space-elevator-part-4.description: Project Part #4. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

item-modular-frame.name: Modular Frame
item-modular-frame.description:
Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.

item-motor.name: Motor
item-motor.description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

item-mycelia.name: Mycelia
item-mycelia.description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

item-nobelisk-explosive.name: Nobelisk
item-nobelisk-explosive.description: Can be used with the Nobelisk Detonator to blow up cracked boulders, vegetation or other vulnerable targets.

item-equipment-descriptor-nobelisk-deton.name: Nobelisk Detonator
item-equipment-descriptor-nobelisk-deton.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Nobelisk

Used to blow up cracked boulders, rocks and invasive vegetation.

item-nuclear-fuel-rod.name: Nuclear Fuel Rod
item-nuclear-fuel-rod.description:
Nuclear Fuel Rods are used as fuel in nuclear reactors.
VERY RADIOACTIVE

item-generator-nuclear.name: Nuclear Power Plant
item-generator-nuclear.description:
Consumes Nuclear Fuel Rods and Water to produce electricty for the power grid.

Produces Nuclear Waste, which is extracted from the conveyor belt output.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

item-equipment-descriptor-object-scanner.name: Object Scanner
item-equipment-descriptor-object-scanner.description:
Slot: Hands

Scans the area for a set item. Beeps at a rate proportional to proximity and direction.

item-oil-pump.name: Oil Extractor
item-oil-pump.description:
Normal extraction rate: 120m³ oil per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Can be build on an Oil Node to extract Crude Oil. Extraction rates depend on node purity.

item-jump-pad.name: Old Jump Pad
item-jump-pad.description:
Propels you upwards through the air.
Make sure you land softly.

item-jump-pad-tilted.name: Old Tilted Jump Pad
item-jump-pad-tilted.description:
Propels you forwards through the air.
Make sure you land softly.

item-quarter-pipe-corner-03.name: Outer-Corner Quarter Pipe
item-quarter-pipe-corner-03.description:
Provides an optional factory look that is smoother and offers possibilities for recreational activities. 
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-fuel.name: Packaged Fuel
item-fuel.description:
Fuel.
Packaged Fuel, either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

item-packaged-oil-residue.name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
item-packaged-oil-residue.description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport.

item-packaged-biofuel.name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
item-packaged-biofuel.description:
Fuel.
Packaged Liquid Biofuel, either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

item-packaged-oil.name: Packaged Oil
item-packaged-oil.description: Crude Oil, packaged for transportation or to be used as vehicle fuel.

item-turbo-fuel.name: Packaged Turbofuel
item-turbo-fuel.description: Packaged Turbofuel, a more efficient alternative to Fuel. Used in vehicles.

item-packager.name: Packager
item-packager.description:
Used for the packaging and unpacking of fluids.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

item-berry.name: Paleberry
item-berry.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore one health segment.

item-wall-window-8x4-03.name: Panel Window
item-wall-window-8x4-03.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
The windows allow Pioneers to see through the wall.

item-parachute.name: Parachute
item-parachute.description:
Slot: Body
Consumable

Slows down your fall when activated in mid-air.

item-storage-player.name: Personal Storage Box
item-storage-player.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

item-petroleum-coke.name: Petroleum Coke
item-petroleum-coke.description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

item-pillar-base.name: Pillar Base
item-pillar-base.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

item-pillar-middle.name: Pillar Middle
item-pillar-middle.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

item-pillar-top.name: Pillar Top
item-pillar-top.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on. 
Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

item-pipeline-junction-cross.name: Pipeline Junction Cross
item-pipeline-junction-cross.description: Can be attached to a pipeline to split it 4-way.

item-pipeline.name: Pipeline Mk.1
item-pipeline.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 300m³ of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

item-pipeline-mk2.name: Pipeline Mk.2
item-pipeline-mk2.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 600m³ of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

item-pipeline-pump.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.1
item-pipeline-pump.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 20 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 20 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

item-pipeline-pump-mk2.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.2
item-pipeline-pump-mk2.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 50 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 50 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

item-pipeline-support.name: Pipeline Support
item-pipeline-support.description:
Can be used as a connection for pipelines. The height of the support can be adjusted.
Useful to route pipelines in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

item-pipeline-support-wall-hole.name: Pipeline Wall Hole
item-pipeline-support-wall-hole.description: Can be attached to walls, allowing Pipelines to pass through them.

item-pipeline-support-wall.name: Pipeline Wall Support
item-pipeline-support-wall.description:
Can be attached to walls.
Used to connect Pipelines over longer distances.

item-plastic.name: Plastic
item-plastic.description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

item-polymer-resin.name: Polymer Resin
item-polymer-resin.description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

item-item-descriptor-portable-miner.name: Portable Miner
item-item-descriptor-portable-miner.description:
Slot: Hands

Can be set up on a resource node to automatically extract the resource. Very limited storage space.

item-power-line.name: Power Line
item-power-line.description: Used to connect Power Poles, Power Generators and Factory buildings.

item-power-pole-mk1.name: Power Pole Mk.1
item-power-pole-mk1.description:
Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

item-power-pole-mk2.name: Power Pole Mk.2
item-power-pole-mk2.description:
Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

item-power-pole-mk3.name: Power Pole Mk.3
item-power-pole-mk3.description:
Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

item-crystal-shard.name: Power Shard
item-crystal-shard.description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

item-conveyor-attachment-splitter-progra.name: Programmable Splitter
item-conveyor-attachment-splitter-progra.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set rules for each output to decide exactly where each part should go.

item-crystal-mk3.name: Purple Power Slug
item-crystal-mk3.description: A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.

item-quarter-pipe.name: Quarter Pipe
item-quarter-pipe.description:
Provides an optional factory look that is smoother and offers possibilities for recreational activities. 
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-quartz-crystal.name: Quartz Crystal
item-quartz-crystal.description: Used for radar and quantum technology.

item-high-speed-wire.name: Quickwire
item-high-speed-wire.description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

item-radar-tower.name: Radar Tower
item-radar-tower.description:
Reveals an area around itself on the map. The area grows over time to a max.
Placing the tower heigher up increases the max area revealed.

item-railroad-track.name: Railway
item-railroad-track.description:
Used to transport trains in a reliable and fast manner.
Has a wide turn angle so make sure to plan it out properly.

item-ramp-8x1-01.name: Ramp 8m x 1m
item-ramp-8x1-01.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

item-ramp-8x2-01.name: Ramp 8m x 2m
item-ramp-8x2-01.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

item-ramp-8x4-01.name: Ramp 8m x 4m
item-ramp-8x4-01.description: Snaps to foundations to make it easier to get on top of them. Works especially well with vehicles.

item-raw-quartz.name: Raw Quartz
item-raw-quartz.description: Raw Quartz is processed into Quartz Crystals which are used for radar and quantum technology.

item-rebar-gun-projectile.name: Rebar Gun
item-rebar-gun-projectile.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Spiked Rebar

Improvised ranged weapon for self defense. Has to be reloaded after each use.

item-oil-refinery.name: Refinery
item-oil-refinery.description:
Refines fluid and/or solid parts into other parts.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

item-iron-plate-reinforced.name: Reinforced Iron Plate
item-iron-plate-reinforced.description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

item-wall-window-8x4-04.name: Reinforced Window
item-wall-window-8x4-04.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
The windows allow Pioneers to see through the wall.

item-equipment-descriptor-rifle.name: Rifle
item-equipment-descriptor-rifle.description:
Slot: Hands
Ammo: Rifle Cartridges

Rapid fire weapon for self-defense. Has a mag size of 10.

item-wall-door-8x4-03.name: Right Door Wall
item-wall-door-8x4-03.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
The door allows Pioneers to pass through the wall.

item-rotor.name: Rotor
item-rotor.description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

item-rubber.name: Rubber
item-rubber.description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

item-iron-screw.name: Screw
item-iron-screw.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

item-silica.name: Silica
item-silica.description: Derived from quartz, commonly used in structural materials and microelectronics.

item-wall-window-8x4-01.name: Single Window
item-wall-window-8x4-01.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
The window allows Pioneers to see through the wall.

item-space-elevator-part-1.name: Smart Plating
item-space-elevator-part-1.description: Project Part #1. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

item-conveyor-attachment-splitter-smart.name: Smart Splitter
item-conveyor-attachment-splitter-smart.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set a rule for which part should go to the left and which part should go to the right.

item-smelter-mk1.name: Smelter
item-smelter-mk1.description:
Smelts ore into ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

item-biofuel.name: Solid Biofuel
item-biofuel.description:
Fuel.
The most energy efficient form of solid biomass.

item-space-elevator.name: Space Elevator
item-space-elevator.description:
Requires deliveries of special Project Parts to complete Phases of Project Assembly.
Completing Phases in the Space Elevator will unlock new Tiers in the HUB Terminal.

item-conveyor-pole-stackable.name: Stackable Conveyor Pole
item-conveyor-pole-stackable.description: Conveyor pole with fixed size that is stackable

item-hyper-pole-stackable.name: Stackable Hyper Tube Support
item-hyper-pole-stackable.description: Support for Hyper Tubes. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

item-pipe-support-stackable.name: Stackable Pipeline Support
item-pipe-support-stackable.description: Support for pipelines. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

item-stair-1b.name: Stairs
item-stair-1b.description: The Stairs allow you to move to the upper floors of your buildings. Height: 4

item-stairs-left-01.name: Stairs Left
item-stairs-left-01.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

item-stairs-right-01.name: Stairs Right
item-stairs-right-01.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

item-stator.name: Stator
item-stator.description: The static parts of a motor

item-steel-plate.name: Steel Beam
item-steel-plate.description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

item-steel-ingot.name: Steel Ingot
item-steel-ingot.description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

item-steel-pipe.name: Steel Pipe
item-steel-pipe.description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

item-storage-container-mk1.name: Storage Container
item-storage-container-mk1.description:
Contains 24 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has an input and output for conveyor belts.

item-sulfur.name: Sulfur
item-sulfur.description: Sulfur is primarily used for Gunpowder.

item-sulfuric-acid.name: Sulfuric Acid
item-sulfuric-acid.description: A liquid mostly used to extract elements from ore.

item-computer-super.name: Supercomputer
item-computer-super.description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

item-trading-post.name: The HUB
item-trading-post.description: The heart of your factory. This is where you complete FICSIT milestones to unlock additional blueprints of buildings, vehicles, parts, equipment etc.

item-tractor.name: Tractor
item-tractor.description:
Fuel: Any fuel type

25 slot inventory. Has a built in craft bench.
Can be automated to pick up and deliver resources at truck stations.

Nicknamed the Sugarcube by FICSIT pioneers with the justification “it’s pretty sweet, y’know”.

item-train-station.name: Train Station
item-train-station.description:
Locomotives can be set to drive to and stop at the Train Station.
You can connect power to the train station to power up the trains on the railway as well as transport the power to other stations.

item-truck.name: Truck
item-truck.description:
Fuel: Any fuel type

48 slot inventory. Has a built in craft bench.
Can be automated to pick up and deliver resources at truck stations.

Nicknamed 'the Unit' by FICSIT pioneers because of its massive frame.

item-truck-station.name: Truck Station
item-truck-station.description:
Either send or receive resources to vehicles. Has an inventory with 48 slots.
Transfers up to 120 stacks per minute to/from docked vehicle. 
Always refuels vehicles if it has access to a matching fuel type.

item-motor-lightweight.name: Turbo Motor
item-motor-lightweight.description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

item-liquid-turbo-fuel.name: Turbofuel
item-liquid-turbo-fuel.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Used in Fuel Generators.

item-landing-pad.name: U-Jelly Landing Pad
item-landing-pad.description:
Generates a speed dampening jelly.
Guarantees a safe landing.

item-ramp-inverted-8x1-corner-01.name: Up Corner   8m x 1m Inverted
item-ramp-inverted-8x1-corner-01.description:
Inverted Ramps mostly provide aesthetic options.
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-ramp-inverted-8x2-corner-01.name: Up Corner   8m x 2m Inverted
item-ramp-inverted-8x2-corner-01.description:
Inverted Ramps mostly provide aesthetic options.
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-ramp-inverted-8x4-corner-01.name: Up Corner   8m x 4m Inverted
item-ramp-inverted-8x4-corner-01.description:
Inverted Ramps mostly provide aesthetic options.
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

item-ramp-diagonal-8x1-02.name: Up Corner Ramp 8m x 1m
item-ramp-diagonal-8x1-02.description:
Ramps make it easier to get up onto Foundations for Pioneers and their Vehicles.
Height: 1

item-ramp-diagonal-8x2-02.name: Up Corner Ramp 8m x 2m
item-ramp-diagonal-8x2-02.description:
Ramps make it easier to get up onto Foundations for Pioneers and their Vehicles.
Height: 2

item-ramp-diagonal-8x4-02.name: Up Corner Ramp 8m x 4m
item-ramp-diagonal-8x4-02.description:
Ramps make it easier to get up onto Foundations for Pioneers and their Vehicles.
Height: 4

item-ore-uranium.name: Uranium
item-ore-uranium.description: Uranium is radioactive. Mainly used in Nuclear Power Plants.

item-uranium-pellet.name: Uranium Pellet
item-uranium-pellet.description:
Produced in the Refinery, Uranium Pellets are purified and cast from Uranium Ore. 
Primarily used to make Uranium Cells.
Moderately radioactive.

item-valve.name: Valve
item-valve.description:
Used to limit Pipeline flow rates.
Can be attached to a Pipeline.

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.

item-space-elevator-part-2.name: Versatile Framework
item-space-elevator-part-2.description: Project Part #2. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

item-walkway-cross.name: Walkway Crossing
item-walkway-cross.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

item-walkway-ramp.name: Walkway Ramp
item-walkway-ramp.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

item-walkway-straight.name: Walkway Straight
item-walkway-straight.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

item-walkway-t.name: Walkway T-Crossing
item-walkway-t.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

item-walkway-turn.name: Walkway Turn
item-walkway-turn.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

item-wall-8x4-01.name: Wall 8m x 4m
item-wall-8x4-01.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Useful for building multi-floor structures.

item-wall-8x4-02.name: Wall 8m x 4m
item-wall-8x4-02.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Useful for building multi-floor structures.

item-wall-conveyor-8x4-04.name: Wall Conveyor Perpendicular
item-wall-conveyor-8x4-04.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection perpendicular to the wall.
Height: 4

item-wall-conveyor-8x4-04-steel.name: Wall Conveyor Perpendicular
item-wall-conveyor-8x4-04-steel.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection perpendicular to the wall.
Height: 4

item-wall-conveyor-8x4-03.name: Wall Conveyor x1
item-wall-conveyor-8x4-03.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 1 conveyor belt connection.
Height: 4

item-wall-conveyor-8x4-02.name: Wall Conveyor x2
item-wall-conveyor-8x4-02.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 2 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

item-wall-conveyor-8x4-02-steel.name: Wall Conveyor x2
item-wall-conveyor-8x4-02-steel.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 2 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

item-wall-conveyor-8x4-01.name: Wall Conveyor x3
item-wall-conveyor-8x4-01.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 3 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

item-wall-conveyor-8x4-01-steel.name: Wall Conveyor x3
item-wall-conveyor-8x4-01-steel.description:
Walls connect to other Walls and Floors. Use these to make buildings with several floors.
Has 3 conveyor belt connections.
Height: 4

item-power-pole-wall.name: Wall Outlet Mk.1
item-power-pole-wall.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

item-power-pole-wall-mk2.name: Wall Outlet Mk.2
item-power-pole-wall-mk2.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

item-power-pole-wall-mk3.name: Wall Outlet Mk.3
item-power-pole-wall-mk3.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

item-water-pump.name: Water Extractor
item-water-pump.description:
Default extraction rate: 120m³ water per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Extracts water from the body of water it is build on.
Note that the water needs to be deep enough and that rivers do not commonly suffice.

item-wire.name: Wire
item-wire.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

item-wood.name: Wood
item-wood.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

item-equipment-descriptor-stun-spear.name: Xeno-Basher
item-equipment-descriptor-stun-spear.description:
Slot: Hands

Heavy electroshock self defense weapon for melee range.

item-equipment-descriptor-shock-shank.name: Xeno-Zapper
item-equipment-descriptor-shock-shank.description:
Slot: Hands

Standard issue electroshock self defense weapon for melee range.

item-crystal-mk2.name: Yellow Power Slug
item-crystal-mk2.description: A strange slug radiating a strange power.
